alert.note: Alert for Clinch; Echols; Northern Ware; Southern Ware; Western Charlton (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 11 at 5:01PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of east central Echols, central Ware, central Clinch and northwestern Charlton Counties through 545 PM EDT... At 500 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles northeast of Cogdell to 8 miles south of Manor to 6 miles northwest of Fargo. Movement was east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 40 to 45 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Waycross, Homerville, Argyle, Stephen Foster State Park, Boggy Bay, Manor, Cogdell and Needham. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Clinch; Echols; Northern Ware; Southern Ware; Western Charlton
